transcript: You feel it's wrong here, don't you? This yard, this chair. I want you to be ready for me. I don't want to have to win you away from anything.

segments.text: You feel it's wrong here, don't you? This yard, this chair.
I want you to be ready for me. I don't want to have to win you away from anything.

metadata.transcript_ground_truth: You feel it's wrong here, don't you?  This yard, this chair.  I want you to be ready for me.  I don't want to have to win you away from anything.
